reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 68/92: SALARIES AND BENEFITS OF MASTERS
reg_info.act_under: Courts of Justice Act   Loi sur les tribunaux judiciaires

content.content: 1. The annual salary of a full-time master shall be the same as the annual salary of a provincial judge who is not the Chief Judge of the Ontario Court (Provincial Division), a regional senior judge or the Co-ordinator of Justices of the Peace.  O. Reg. 68/92, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The annual salary of a full-time master shall be the same as the annual salary of a provincial judge who is not the Chief Judge of the Ontario Court (Provincial Division), a regional senior judge or the Co-ordinator of Justices of the Peace.  O. Reg. 68/92, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Ontario Regulation 67/92 (Salaries and Benefits of Provincial Judges), except sections 2 and 78, applies with necessary modifications to masters and, for that purpose, a reference in the Regulation, (a) to a “judge” shall be deemed to be a reference to a master; and (b) to the “Chief Judge” shall be deemed to be a reference to the Chief Justice of the Ontario Court.  O. Reg. 68/92, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. Ontario Regulation 67/92 (Salaries and Benefits of Provincial Judges), except sections 2 and 78, applies with necessary modifications to masters and, for that purpose, a reference in the Regulation,

(a) to a “judge” shall be deemed to be a reference to a master; and

(b) to the “Chief Judge” shall be deemed to be a reference to the Chief Justice of the Ontario Court.  O. Reg. 68/92, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 68/92, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 68/92, s. 3.

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 68/92, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 68/92, s. 4.
